segments.text: Kathy ! How are you ? It's been ages ! What are you doing these days ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just opened my own restaurant . I'm also head chef .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're kidding ! You've always hated cooking !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I used to hate cooking , but now I love it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When did you change your mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After I tried French food . Before that , I used to cook really boring things for my family .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I still can't believe it ! So , did you go to cooking school or something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I went to California to study .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? How long did you stay there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And what did you do after that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I came back here . I worked for about three years to get some experience .
segments.speaker: S2
